name: .IWD File Extension
summary: Learn about .IWD files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: IWD files are not meant to be opened. Instead, Activision Call of Duty 2 and Call of Duty 4 reference the data in the files.

However, since IWD files are Zip-compressed, you can open them and extract their contents with a Zip utility, such as Microsoft File Explorer (Windows), Apple Archive Utility (macOS), or Corel WinZip (Windows). However, you should not modify IWD files unless you know the correct changes to make. Altering an IWD file may make it unusable by Call of Duty.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
